messages.message: Hey everyone, I forgot to send out anything about this before, but now, when running metaflow with flow v1, you will have to select a metaflow file as well. This is required in order to get metaflow auto-compilation working and matches the regular metaflow compilation interface better. If this is affecting any customer flows, let me know, and I can make the metaflow file optional, but I think itâ€™s better to match the metaflow binary experience.
